data.persona: I am a priest. I attend to the salvation of my flock. I have few possessions. I trust in the will and goodness of god to see me through adversity.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
The duke is here.

You are carrying a bible, and wearing a vestment.

data.short_motivation: I want to gift the Duke the bible
data.mid_motivation: I hope the Duke reads the bible from today
data.long_motivation: I hope the Duke becomes less harsh on his people in the coming weeks
